result.execSummary:
The defendant Thomas Arden Harder was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of Methamphetamine, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(g).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
DEF is placed on probation for 2 years, CONSECUTIVE to 13CM296.  

Consecutive to: consecutive to 13CM296

miscConds.notes: $829.25 fine   If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due. All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

$250 DNA surcharge.    If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due. All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.
Absolute Sobriety  No drug use without a valid prescription.
Def. must provide DNA sample and pay applicable $ 250 surcharge.
AODA assessment  within 45 days of commencement of supervision and follow-through with recommendations.

judgments.dispoDesc: DEF pleads No Contest to Ct #1, found Guilty.  Sentence is withheld and DEF is placed on probation for 2 years, CONSECUTIVE to 13CM296.  $1079.25 fine including DNA surcharge.  DNA sample to be submitted.    AODA assessment  within 45 days of commencement of supervision, and follow-through with recommendations. Absolute Sobriety, no possession or consumption.    No drug use without a valid prescription.

Defendant Thomas Arden Harder in court, in custody, with attorney Stephen Zuber.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
DE advised of rights and penalties; DE waives rights; parties stipulate to facts.  Presentence Investigation is waived.
 DEF pleads No Contest to Ct #1, found Guilty.  Sentence is withheld and DEF is placed on probation for 2 years, CONSECUTIVE to 13CM296.  $1079.25 fine including DNA surcharge.  DNA sample to be submitted.    AODA assessment  within 45 days of commencement of supervision, and follow-through with recommendations. Absolute Sobriety, no possession or consumption.    No drug use without a valid prescription.
Ct #2 dismissed but read in.

Defendant Thomas Arden Harder in court with attorney Stephen Zuber.  Defendant Thomas Arden Harder in custody.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin. OFF record for scheduling. Final Pre-Trial scheduled for May 12, 2015 at 1:30pm.  Jury trial scheduled for May 22, 2015 at 08:15 am.

APPEARANCES:  Defendant Thomas Arden Harder in court with Attorney Stephen Zuber.  Defendant Thomas Arden Harder in custody.  John Martin Yackel appeared on behalf of Bruce Poquette for the State of Wisconsin.

DE acknowledges receipt of Information.  DE pleads NOT GUILTY to Counts 1 and 1; Court enters those pleas on behalf of DE.  Scheduling conference scheduled for April 6, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Thomas Arden Harder in court by video with attorney Stephen Zuber.  Defendant Thomas Arden Harder in custody.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court questions DEF - waives right to Preliminary Hearing,  Arraignment scheduled for February 6, 2015 at 11:00 am.
Scheduling conference on January 20, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

As per telephone call from Attorney Steve Zuber's office, they have been retained by Defendant, and requested to reschedule Scheduling date from 01/13/15 to 01/20/15.  They will be sending in a notice of retainer.  Hearing reset - notice sent to both Attorney Duffy & Attorney Zuber.  mak

APPEARANCES:  Defendant Thomas Arden Harder in court via video means with Attorney Thomas W Duffy.  Defendant Thomas Arden Harder in custody.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Defendant advised of rights/penalties and acknowledges receipt of complaint.  DE waives time limits for preliminary hearing.  Court enters NOT GUILTY plea to Count 2 on behalf of DE.  

Scheduling conference scheduled for January 13, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
